price: Sema: Mola wangu Mlezi! Hukumu kwa haki. Na Mola wetu Mlezi ni Mwingi wa Rehema, aombwaye msaada juu ya mnayo yazua;.
arabic: قَٰلَ رَبِّ ٱحۡكُم بِٱلۡحَقِّۗ وَرَبُّنَا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ٱلۡمُسۡتَعَانُ عَلَىٰ مَا تَصِفُونَ
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Sema: Ewe Mola Mlezi! Tuhukumu baina yangu na hawa nilio wafikishia Wahyi kwa uadilifu ili wasiwe sawa Waumini na makafiri. Na Mola wetu Mlezi Mwenye kuneemesha kwa neema kubwa, Mwenye kustahiki kuhimidiwa na kushukuriwa, ndiye wa kutakiwa msaada kuvunja uzushi mnao zua, enyi makafiri.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi uḥ'kum bil-ḥaqi warabbunā al-raḥmānu al-mus'taʿānu ʿalā mā taṣifūna
translations: the One Whose help is sought
